Sentencas: We describe a method of obtaining anode-supported ZrO2:Y2O3 (YSZ) electrolyte films produced by reactive magnetron sputtering for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: The effect of pulsed electron beam pretreatment of magnetron sputtered ZrO2:Y2O3 films on the performance of IT-SOFC

Sentencas: A pulsed electron beam treatment was used as a method of preliminary modification of the porous structure in anode substrates.
Titulo: The effect of pulsed electron beam pretreatment of magnetron sputtered ZrO2:Y2O3 films on the performance of IT-SOFC

Sentencas: we studied the influence of this pretreatment on the gas tightness, structural and electrochemical properties of deposited films.
Titulo: The effect of pulsed electron beam pretreatment of magnetron sputtered ZrO2:Y2O3 films on the performance of IT-SOFC

Sentencas: It is shown that magnetron sputtering combined with a pulsed electron-beam treatment leads to the formation of dense and uniform YSZ films of 3-5 mu m in thickness with a fine microstructure and improvement of electrochemical properties.
Titulo: The effect of pulsed electron beam pretreatment of magnetron sputtered ZrO2:Y2O3 films on the performance of IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Multifold increase in power density and a decrease in the YSZ electrolyte resistance compared to the samples produced only by magnetron sputtering were achieved.
Titulo: The effect of pulsed electron beam pretreatment of magnetron sputtered ZrO2:Y2O3 films on the performance of IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Single cells with sputtered YSZ electrolyte and LSM as active cathode materials were tested.
Titulo: The effect of pulsed electron beam pretreatment of magnetron sputtered ZrO2:Y2O3 films on the performance of IT-SOFC

Sentencas: 1.08 V open circuit voltage and a 310 mW cm(-2) maximum power density were achieved at 700 degrees C by using humidified H-2 as fuel and air as an oxidant.
Titulo: The effect of pulsed electron beam pretreatment of magnetron sputtered ZrO2:Y2O3 films on the performance of IT-SOFC
